name: SCNAudioSource
desc: A simple, reusable audio source—music or sound effects loaded from a file—for use in positional audio playback.

items.name: init?(named: String)
items.desc: Returns the audio source associated with the specified filename.

items.name: init?(fileNamed: String)
items.desc: Initializes an audio source from an audio file in the application’s main bundle.

items.name: init?(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes an audio source from the specified audio file.

items.name: var isPositional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether audio from this source uses 3D positional mixing.

items.name: func load()
items.desc: Loads audio data from the source and prepares it for playing.

items.name: var volume: Float
items.desc: The default playback volume for the audio source.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: The default playback rate for the audio source.

items.name: var reverbBlend: Float
items.desc: The default blend of blend of unmodified and reverb-processed (also called dry and wet) audio for playback of the audio source.

items.name: var loops: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the audio source should play repeatedly.

items.name: var shouldStream: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the audio source should stream content from its source URL when playing.
